entry.title: Awesome Aurelia Updates on Jun 10 - Jun 16, 2019
entry.content:
Aurelia Tutorials / Aurelia Books

  • Aurelia for Real World Applications by Dwayne Charrington (Dec 2018, 174 pages)
  • Mastering Aurelia Store By Dwayne Charrington (last updated Nov 2018)
  • Aurelia in Action By Sean Hunter (Aug 2018, 432 pages)
  • Hands-On Full Stack Web Development with Aurelia By Diego Argüelles & Erikson Murrugarra (June 2018, 348 pages)
  • Practical App Development with Aurelia by Matthew Duffield (March 2018)
  • Practical Aurelia by Behzad Abbasi (behzad888) (March 2018, 137 pages)
  • Learning Aurelia by Manuel Guilbault (Dec 2016, 292 pages)
  • Beginning Aurelia by Behzad Abbasi (behzad888) (July 2016, 218 pages)
  • Aurelia App Amazement By Kristian Mandrup (2016)

entry.title: Awesome Aurelia Updates on Jun 06 - Jun 12, 2016
entry.content:
Official Resources

  • Official Site
  • Official Documentation
  • API Documentation
  • Official Getting Started Guide
  • Official GitHub Repo (⭐12k)
  • Rob Eisenberg on Twitter

Community

  • #aureliajs hashtag on Twitter
  • Gitter Channel
  • Gitter Channel for Aurelia TypeScript
  • Aurelia StackOverflow
  • Aurelia AMA (Ask Me Anything)
  • /r/Aureliajs Subreddit
  • Aurelia on Google+

Experts on personal blogs

  • Personal blog of Aurelia developer Matthew James Davis
  • Personal blog on Aurelia dev / Developer Jeremy Danyow
  • Personal blog on Aurelia dev / Developer Patrick Walters aka 'PWKAD'
  • Personal blog on Aurelia dev / Developer Ashley Grant
  • Personal blog of Australian Front End / Aurelia Javascript Developer Dwayne Charrington
  • Personal blog on Aurelia dev / Developer Don Wilcox aka 'drdwilcox'
  • Personal blog on Aurelia dev / Developer Michael Lambert
  • Personal blog on Aurelia dev / Developer Sean Hunter
  • Personal blog on Aurelia dev / Developer Paul van Bladel
  • Rob Eisenberg's other Blog

Aurelia Tools

  • vscode-aurelia-snippets (⭐15) * HTML, JavaScript and TypeScript snippets for VSCode
  • aurelia-update (⭐16) * Update all aurelia dependencies easily.

Seed Project

  • Beginner kits * Houses the beginner getting started started kits for ES 2016 and TypeScript.

Typescript Seed Projects / Aurelia + Electron Examples

  • {{ add_your_repo }}
  • Aurelia Typescript (⭐144) * A starter kit for working with the Aurelia TypeScript type definitions by @cmichaelgraham
  • aurelia-axel (⭐2) * As a Visual Studio TypeScript and C# developer building web-based, spatial information systems targeting a variety of platforms that leverage ESRI and SQL Server, I want a starter kit so that I can rapidly build implementations
  • aurelia-axel-northwind (⭐2) * As a user, I want a walk through of creating a web app from the aurelia-axel starter kit, based of a familiar database (Northwind)
  • aurelia-skeleton-navigation-gulp-typescript (⭐12) * Aurelia navigation skeleton implemented with Gulp and Typescript

Aurelia Generators

  • zewa666/generator-aurelia (⭐77) Yeoman generator for the JavaScript Framework Aurelia by @zewa666
  • kristianmandrup/generator-aurelia-ts (⭐33) Turbo Start generator for Aurelia apps by @kristianmandrup

Aurelia Cheatsheet

  • Aurelia Getting Started Cheat Sheet by ErikCH

Aurelia Tutorials

  • Aurelia Value Converters
  • Aurelia & Framework7 vs. Angular2 & Ionic2
  • Aurelia-styleguide (⭐24) * A starting point for Aurelia development teams to provide consistency through best practices.

Aurelia Tutorials / Aurelia Podcasts

  • 02.22.2016 No Fluff Just Stuff Podcast: Checking out Aurelia with Peter Pavlovich
  • 02.18.2016 Program With Erik Podcast: The History Behind Aurelia with Rob Eisenberg
  • 02.11.2016 Adventures in Angular Podcast: Aurelia with Rob Eisenberg
  • 08.04.2015 Herding Code 203: Rob Eisenberg on Aurelia
  • 06.02.2015 The Changelog #140: Aurelia, Durandal, and leaving AngularJS with Rob Eisenberg
  • 02.02.2015 The Web Platform Podcast : 38: Aurelia.io

Aurelia Tutorials / Aurelia Videos

  • 05.04.2016 Brian Noyes | Aurelia Fundamentals on Pluralsight.com
  • 11.01.2016 Rob Eisenberg | Aurelia: Next Generation Web Apps | NDC {London}
  • 12.16.2015 Ashley Grant on Custom Components in Aurelia | Dev Chat
  • 12.10.2015 Jeremy Danyow on Binding | Readthesource 12
  • 12.09.2015 Jakub Jedryszek | Aurelia * The next generation JavaScript framework you will love | SeattleCodeCamp
  • 11.12.2015 Rob Eisenberg on Aurelia | DEVIntersection 2015 | Channel 9

Material Design / Aurelia Articles

  • Official Aurelia Material Design (Github) (⭐85)
  • aurelia-mdl (⭐22)
  • aurelia-material (⭐49)

Aurelia Plugins / Aurelia Articles

  • aurelia-auth (⭐199) * Token-based authentication plugin for aurelia
  • aurelia-computed (⭐25) * A plugin for Aurelia to observe computed properties without dirty-checking
  • aurelia-i18n (⭐94) {official} * A plugin that provides i18n support
  • aurelia-ui-virtualization (⭐90) {official} * A plugin that provides a virtualized repeater and other virtualization services
  • aurelia-bs-grid (⭐43) * Aurelia and Bootstrap powered datagrid control
  • aurelia-polymer (⭐18) * Aurelia plugin to support Polymer
  • aurelia-google-maps (⭐45) * A highly configurable custom element for use in your Aurelia applications for inserting Google Maps into your application
  • webpack-plugin (⭐90) {official} * A plugin for webpack that enables bundling Aurelia applications
  • aurelia-cycle (⭐6) * An Aurelia plugin that enables the use of Cycle.js inside of Aurelia
  • aurelia-kendoui-bridge (⭐117) * Aurelia and KendoUI integration
  • aurelia-react-loader (⭐25) * Load React components directly from Aurelia views
  • aurelia-validatejs (⭐22) {official} * Enables expressive validation using decorators and/or a fluent API.
  • aurelia-view-pipeline (⭐2) * A plugin for loading any Markdown into custom element
  • aurelia-routed-footer (⭐2) * An Aurelia plugin which adds the ability to control footer content via the router
  • aurelia-api (⭐72) {ES6/TS/Webpack} * A wrapper around aurelia-fetch-client for multiple endpoints
  • aurelia-authentication (⭐90) {ES6/TS/Webpack} * Authentication plugin for aurelia with aurelia-api support.
  • aurelia-orm (⭐76) {ES6/TS/Webpack} * Makes working with entities and calling your Rest API simple.
  • aurelia-notification (⭐29) {ES6/TS/Webpack} * Automatically translated notifications utilizing humane.js and i18n
  • aurelia-binding-loader (⭐11) * An Aurelia loader for using any module directly from a view template
  • aurelia-dragula (⭐29) * An ES2015 port of the Dragula library, targeted at the Aurelia Framework
  • aurelia-breeze (⭐63) * Everything you need to use Breeze with Aurelia
  • aurelia-bootstrap-datepicker * An aurelia port for bootstrap-datepicker
  • Aurelia-Configuration (⭐101) * Smart configuration for your Aurelia applications.
  • aurelia-environment (⭐6) * aurelia-environment provides simple .env parsing and loading
  • aurelia-firebase (⭐23) * A Firebase plugin for Aurelia
  • aurelia-flux (⭐74) * Flux dispatcher plugin for Aurelia
  • aurelia-grid (⭐15) * A fresh Aurelia Grid written in TypeScript based charlespockert's Aurelia BS Grid
  • aurelia-google-analytics (⭐29) * An Aurelia.io plugin that adds Google Analytics page tracking to your project.
  • aurelia-knockout (⭐22) * A Knockout plugin for Aurelia
  • aurelia-leaflet (⭐4) * Leaflet Plugin for Aurelia
  • aurelia-notify (⭐16) * A notification plugin for Aurelia
  • aurelia-rethink-bindtable (⭐16) * Aurelia bind table integration for RethinkDB via Socket.io
  • aurelia-switch * An aurelia optimised switchButton
  • aurelia-yt-player (⭐4) * Aurelia plugin for Youtube player API
  • abalmus/aurelia-ace-editor (⭐4) * Aurelia ace editor plugin

Aurelia Libraries / Aurelia Articles

  • aurelia-sails-socket-client (⭐21) * A simple, restful, message-based wrapper around sails.io client
  • pollyfils (⭐26) * The minimal set of polyfills needed to run Aurelia
  • aurelia-bundler (⭐37) * A library for bundling JavaScript, HTML and CSS for use with SystemJS

Aurelia Implementation / Aurelia Articles

  • aurelia-animator-tinyanimate (⭐3) * Implementation of the Aurelia base animator using TinyAnimate
  • sukobuto/aurelia-tinymce-sample (⭐1) * Sample app with Aurelia and TinyMCE
  • stamp-web/stamp-web-aurelia (⭐17) * Next Generation Stamp Web Editor written in Aurelio with Bootstrap
  • aurelia-tabs (⭐17) * A dependency free tabs component for your Aurelia applications. Allows you to toggle between sections of content, with supports for dynamically composing views with optional data
  • aurelia-flickr-ts-memo-game * Match the pairs type of game written with Aurelia in TypeScript using Flickr

Aurelia Custom Element / Aurelia Articles

  • aurelia-leaflet (⭐17) * A Leaflet CustomElement for Aurelia
  • aurelia-chart (⭐46) * A chart element for aurelia which is powered by chart js using html5 canvas

Aurelia Auth / Aurelia Articles

  • sentry * An Aurelia template with a built in authentication shell
  • aurelia-authentication-loopback-sample (⭐7) * Aurelia client sample with aurelia-authentication and loopback server (ES6/TS+jspm, ES6+webpack)
  • aurelia-identityserver-aspnetcore (⭐37) * Sample integrating aurelia with identityserver 4 and docker

TypeScript General Resources / Aurelia + Electron Examples

  • TypeScript Official Website for TypeScript
  • REPL Official TypeScript REPL that runs entirely in your browser
  • TypeScript Repository (GitHub) (⭐105k) Official GitHub Repo for TypeScript
  • DefinitelyTyped Repository (GitHub) (⭐50k) The repository for high quality TypeScript type definitions.
  • TSD TypeScript Definition manager for DefinitelyTyped

ES5 General Resources / Aurelia + Electron Examples

  • {{ help_add_resources }}

ES5 Seed Projects / Aurelia + Electron Examples

  • ahmedshuhel/nav-app-es5 (⭐9) Skeleton that sets up a standard aurelia navigation-style app just using ES5, Bower and RequireJS by @ahmedshuhel.

ES5 Examples / Aurelia + Electron Examples

  • aurelia-observer-patterns (⭐27) * Simple examples for different methods of implementing observer patterns in Aurelia

Meteor Seed Projects / Aurelia + Electron Examples

  • TsumiNa/meteor-aurelia (⭐24) Skeleton that allows Meteor to use Aurelia as the front-end by @TsumiNa.
  • Search previous suggestions before making a new one, as yours may be a duplicate.
  • If you just created something, wait at least a couple of weeks before submitting.
  • You should of course have read or used the thing you're submitting.
  • Make an individual pull request for each suggestion.
  • Use the following format: [name](link) * Description.
  • Keep descriptions short and simple, but descriptive.
  • Start the description with a capital and end with a full stop/period.
  • Check your spelling and grammar.
  • Make sure your text editor is set to remove trailing whitespace.
  • Link additions should be added to the bottom of the relevant section.
  • New categories or improvements to the existing categorization are welcome.
  • Pull requests should have a useful title and include a link to the package and why it should be included.
entry.summary: 121 awesome projects updated on Jun 06 - Jun 12, 2016
